definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Objective To study the distribution of proteoglycan aggregate in human cervical inter-vertebral discs and its clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈椎间盘蛋白多糖聚合体的分布及其意义。

sentences.english: Meguiar's new NXT GenerationTM Tech Wax is a completely new formula based upon cutting-edge polymer technology.
sentences.chinese: 美光的NXT新一代蜡王是聚合体技术的全新配方。

sentences.english: The polymeric shell is a copolymer of a vinylidene chloride and acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 该聚合体外壳是偏二氯乙烯与丙烯腈的共聚物。

sentences.english: These polymers are said to be thermoplastic.
sentences.chinese: 这类聚合体被称为热塑材料。

sentences.english: Once ELPs in solution reach a certain threshold temperature, they assemble into protein aggregates.
sentences.chinese: 当这种蛋白质达到阈温度时，便会聚集成聚合体。

sentences.english: They can be derived as aggregates of more tightly coupled group of low level fine-grained objects.
sentences.chinese: 它们是低级细粒度对象的更加紧密耦合的聚合体。

definition: to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)
